## Resources.DeltaGenerator class

Class for generating resource deltas between baseline and delta resolvers. Creates partial/augment candidates for updated resources and full/replace candidates for new resources. Uses Diff.jsonThreeWayDiff for efficient delta computation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class DeltaGenerator 
```

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `DeltaGenerator` class.

</td><td>
